message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, a significant discount from its original valuation of $1,200,000. We trust that this offer presents an excellent chance for both parties to benefit. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal.
